In 1968, The North Face began designing and manufacturing its own brand of high-performance mountaineering apparel and equipment, and in the early 1980s, extreme skiwear was added to the product offering. By the end of the decade, The North Face became the only supplier in the United States to offer a comprehensive collection of high-performance outerwear, skiwear, sleeping bags, packs and tents. Through the 1960s, The North Face brand cherished a following amongst avid outdoor athletes and began sponsoring expeditions to some of the most far-flung, still largely untouched corners of the globe. This launched a proud tradition which continues in full force today and constantly reinforces The North Face mantra, Never Stop Exploring.

The north face jacket's wash care

The north face jackets are not cheap,so we need to take good care of it.When we wash it,we should be careful.The right way you take care of it,the north face will wear much longger.The north face is hot sale in our north face outlet,no sale tax on all north face coat sale.Want good quality outdoor jacket,welcome to our north face jacket outlet for north face jackets sale.

When you wash north face jackets,you need to pay an attention to following things:

1.Please choose neutral detergent,as alkaline detergent will be harm to the north face jacket.If you do not know which is alkaline detergent,you can use shampoo instead.

2.Do not wet the north face jacket in water for long time,and do not put them under strong sunshine,put the wet north face jacket in the shade dry.

3.If the north face jacket are not very dirt,do not wash the whole coat,just wash the dirt part of the north face coat.This will reduce the harm to the cloth.

4.When you put the jacket in the closet,avoid folded,just hang the north face jacket there.

The North Face loves the outdoors which is clear by their enormous collection of jackets, pants and ski clothes. It's where they develop character, confidence, clear minds healthy bodies and a respect for nature. Their goal is to inspire the next generation of explorers and conservationists by helping them discover nature's playground.The Denali Jacket by the North Face is one of the brand's most popular classic fleece jackets. A great all-around option for cold weather, the Denali jacket offers serious protection in a variety of weather conditions. With abrasion-resistant panels on the shoulders, torso, and elbows, this zip-up is sturdy enough to last through multiple years of heavy use.The Denali jacket features super soft and durable recycled Polartec 300 series fleece constructed with DWR, a bluesign approved fabric, and zip-in compatibility with select North Face outerwear. The abrasion-reinforced shoulders and elbows will add superior protection during those wicked snowball fights with the boys. The women's Denali has a standard fit, weighing only 20.4 oz. designed to layer over your favorite North Face clothing while still showing off your hotness.
